item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 特朗普可能会发现弱势美元来之不易
item.description:
虽然与他的其他经济优先事项存在冲突，但他将货币放在了最重要的位置。【原文：

There are clashes with his other economic priorities — but he’s putting the currency front and center.

】

item.title: 马克龙看守政府的长期计划
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）将法国推向未知的宪政领域，他正在为可能在数月内由一个权力有限的看守政府管理法国做准备。【原文：Emmanuel Macron is preparing for the possibility of running France with a caretaker government with limited powers for months as he pushes the country into uncharted constitutional territory.】

item.title: 法国准备进行大选后的首次债券拍卖 消除对财政危机的担忧
item.description: 自本月大选导致议会悬而未决以来，法国准备首次举债，这是政治不确定性加剧后对投资者胃口的最新考验。【原文：France is poised to raise debt for the first time since an election this month resulted in a hung parliament, the latest test of investor appetite after a stretch of heightened political uncertainty.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在关键数据公布前暂缓加息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四将维持利率稳定，宁愿等待通胀进展的进一步证明，然后再在 6 月份的首次降息基础上再加息。【原文：The European Central Bank will keep interest rates steady on Thursday, preferring to await further proof of progress on inflation before adding to June’s initial cut.】

item.title: Skyfall 现金是印度消费类股票的福音？
马来西亚通过在森林城市建立免税区的法律
item.description: 马来西亚通过法规，将森林城市开发项目中的一个岛屿公告为免税区，作为重振这个陷入困境的大城市的努力的一部分。【原文：Malaysia passes regulations that will enable an island under the Forest City development to be gazetted a duty-free zone as part of efforts to revive the struggling megacity.】

item.title: 最热门宏观空头岌岌可危，利率押注最终青睐日元
item.description: 日元近几日的大幅反弹似乎使这一陷入困境的货币摆脱了根深蒂固的走低趋势，许多策略师认为日元还有进一步上涨的空间。【原文：The yen’s furious rally in recent days looks to have catapulted the beleaguered currency out of an entrenched march lower, with many strategists seeing room for more gains.】

item.title: 调查显示：印度人的支出将一如既往地节俭
item.description: 随着印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的新政府出售债务，印度似乎将在新兴市场官员放松银根的大潮中逆流而上。【原文：India looks set to swim against the current of emerging market officials loosening the purse strings, with debt sales by Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s new government seen in line with earlier projections.】

item.title: 牙科植入物制造商 Osstem 正洽谈收购 ZimVie
item.description: 据知情人士透露，牙科植入物制造商 Osstem Implant 公司正在就收购在纽约上市的同行 ZimVie 公司进行深入谈判。【原文：Dental implant maker Osstem Implant Co. is in advanced talks to acquire New York-listed peer ZimVie Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 数十亿美元的捷克交易令韩国核电股票飙升
item.description: 韩国核电公司击败法国和美国竞争对手，被选中在捷克共和国建造两座反应堆，从而赢得了这一价值数十亿美元的项目，韩国核能股因此大涨。【原文：South Korean nuclear energy stocks surged after Korea Hydro & Nuclear Power Co. was chosen to build two reactors in the Czech Republic, beating out French and US rivals for the multibillion dollar project.】

item.title: 担心美国贸易限制，亚洲科技股跌势加剧
item.description: 由于担心美国收紧对华半导体销售限制，亚洲科技股连续第二天下跌。【原文：Asian technology stocks fell for a second day on concerns over tighter US curbs on semiconductor sales to China.】

item.title: 泰国亿万富翁旗下的泰国啤酒公司将退出 Frasers 地产公司的股份
item.description: 泰国首富 Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi 控制的饮料公司 Thai Beverage Pcl 将出售其在新加坡房地产公司 Frasers Property Ltd. 的全部股份。【原文：Thai Beverage Pcl, a drinks company controlled by Thailand’s richest person Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi, will offload its entire stake in Frasers Property Ltd., the Singapore-based real estate firm he controls.】

item.title: 前高管称日本央行本月可能不会加息
item.description: 据一位前执行董事称，日本央行本月不太可能加息，相反，其债券购买的削减幅度将略高于预期，以避免加剧日元的疲软。【原文：The Bank of Japan is unlikely to raise interest rates this month and will instead cut its bond buying a little more than expected to avoid any fueling of yen weakness, according to a former executive director.】

item.title: 降息在即，菲律宾债券将扩大领先印尼的优势
item.description: 随着货币政策前景成为投资者关注的焦点，菲律宾降息的前景推动了该国债券的反弹，使其领先于印度尼西亚的债券。【原文：The prospect of an interest-rate cut in the Philippines is powering a rally in the nation’s bonds, putting them ahead of Indonesia’s as monetary policy outlooks take center-stage for investors.】

item.title: 保险分销商 TWFG 突破 IPO 目标，筹资 1.87 亿美元
item.description: TWFG Inc. 是一家个人和商业保险分销商，首次公开募股募集了 1.87 亿美元，股票定价高于市场范围。【原文：TWFG Inc., a personal and commercial insurance distributor, raised $187 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares above a marketed range.】

item.title: 据 ST 报道，华侨银行出售与新加坡洗钱丑闻有关的圣淘沙地块
item.description: 据《海峡时报》（Straits Times）报道，华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.）已接受超过 2,000 万新元（1,500 万美元）的出价，以购买圣淘沙湾（Sentosa Cove）的一块地皮。【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. has accepted an offer of more than S$20 million ($15 million) for a Sentosa Cove land plot that was seized from a convict involved in Singapore’s biggest money laundering case, the Straits Times reported without citing where it got the information.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好在中国打压芯片之际，美国提出更严厉的贸易限制措施。芯片制造商创 2020 年以来最大跌幅。特朗普前助手称中国威胁显而易见。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US floats tougher trade curbs amid China chip crackdown. Chipmakers plunge the most since 2020. Former Trump aide says China threat is clear. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国原油库存再次下降，原油涨幅扩大
item.description: 美国原油库存连续第三周下降，表明需求依然强劲，此后石油价格走高。【原文：Oil edged higher — after the biggest daily jump in more than five weeks — after US crude stockpiles logged their third consecutive weekly decline, a sign that demand remains robust.】

item.title: 外出就餐需求减弱，中国餐饮股黯然失色
item.description: 中国消费者正在减少外出就餐的次数，这对相关股票造成沉重打击，因为投资者对这一一度强劲的行业及其对国内经济的影响感到厌倦。【原文：Chinese consumers are cutting back on dining out, dealing a heavy blow to related shares as investors grow weary over the once-strong sector and its impact on the domestic economy.】

item.title: 全球企业主导的印度大宗交易额达到创纪录的 150 亿美元
item.description: 国际公司正在利用印度股市的强势，向希望参与其中的投资者出售当地子公司的股份。【原文：International companies are seizing on the strength of India’s stock market to offload stakes in local subsidiaries to investors wanting to get in on the action.】

item.title: 公司公布基金费用，以太 ETF 争夺战一触即发
item.description: 争夺潜在以太 ETF 资产的战斗已经打响— 即使基金尚未推出。【原文：The battle for potential Ether ETF assets is already underway — even as the funds have yet to launch.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将下跌，芯片股跌势加剧：市场综述
item.description: 由于担心美国将收紧对华芯片销售限制，科技股大跌，亚洲股市早盘注定下跌。【原文：Asian equities were set for early declines following a selloff in technology stocks on concerns the US would impose tighter restrictions on chip sales to China.】

item.title: 美国大选焦虑可能为韩国债券带来买入机会
item.description: 投资者和分析师说，今年晚些时候美国大选引发的剧烈波动可能为购买韩国债券提供良机。【原文：Heightened volatility stemming from the US elections later this year may provide a good opportunity to buy South Korea’s bonds, investors and analysts say.】

item.title: 大宗交易为日本经纪商带来 50 亿美元的意外之财
item.description: 日本交叉持股的大甩卖已经开始，经纪人们正在争相从数十亿美元的费用中分一杯羹。【原文：The great sell off of Japan’s cross-shareholdings has started and brokers are jockeying for a slice of the billions of dollars in fees at stake.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织将推动二十国集团制定降低穷国债务成本和避免违约的计划
item.description: 国际货币基金组织正努力将 20 国集团团结在一项新的努力周围，以帮助穷国减轻债务负担、避免违约并稳定其经济。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is seeking to rally Group of 20 nations around a new effort to help poor countries reduce debt burdens, avoid defaults and stabilize their economies.】

item.title: McKesson、Cencora 和 Cardinal Health 联合佛罗里达癌症专科医院
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，几家公开上市的药品分销商正在争相收购佛罗里达癌症专科&研究所，这是一家私人控股的肿瘤诊所运营商。【原文：Several publicly traded drug distributors are vying to buy Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute, a privately held operator of oncology clinics, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 帕拉丁能源公司希望通过加拿大收购进入铀矿大联盟
item.description: 帕拉丁能源有限公司（Paladin Energy Ltd.）的顶头上司称，该公司对裂变铀公司（Fission Uranium Corp. ）的收购将使其成为第三大公开交易铀生产商，为投资者在两大巨头主导的行业中提供了另一种选择。【原文：Paladin Energy Ltd.’s top boss says its takeover of Fission Uranium Corp. would make it the third-largest publicly traded uranium producer, offering investors an alternative in a sector dominated by two giants.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会起诉数字世界公司前首席执行官，指控其证券欺诈
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会起诉了帮助唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体公司上市的空头支票公司的前首席执行官帕特里克-奥兰多。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission sued Patrick Orlando, the former chief executive of the blank-check firm that helped bring Donald Trump’s social media company public.】

item.title: 伊石油与能源转让公司就阿根廷输油管道融资事宜进行谈判
item.description: 阿根廷原油钻探商 YPF SA 已与美国管道公司 Energy Transfer LP 举行会谈，为一条跨国管道融资，这条管道是南美国家加强页岩油出口雄心的关键。【原文：Argentine crude driller YPF SA has held talks with US pipeline company Energy Transfer LP to finance a cross-country conduit that’s key to the South American nation’s ambitions of ramping up shale oil exports.】
